casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2013-0186. State v. Codeluppi.

Lorain App. No. 11CA010133, 2012-Ohio-5812. Discretionary appeal accepted on Proposition of Law No. I.

O’Connor, C.J., and Lanzinger and O’Neill, JJ., would also accept the appeal on Proposition of Law No. II.

Pfeifer and O’Donnell, JJ., dissent.
